summary: Create an app based on the website at https://gigantic-script-vault-hub.base44.app/
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App icon at 192x192 pixels showing the circular Rawly41 logo with pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
- App icon at 512x512 pixels showing the circular Rawly41 logo with pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (icon-512.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage layout that displays a collection of scripts in a grid or card format, allowing users to browse available scripts
Add script search and filtering functionality to help users find specific scripts by keyword or category
Create script detail view that displays full script content with syntax highlighting and copy functionality
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to enable script submission and management

Add a distinctive visual theme inspired by developer tools and code repositories, using a modern dark theme with accent colors (not blue/purple), monospace typography for code, and clean card-based layouts
Update the application name from 'Script Vault Hub' to 'Rawly41 Store' in all visible locations including the HTML title tag, header logo text, and any other user-facing references
Replace the current logo/profile picture with the uploaded custom image (Gemini_Generated_Image_z68096z68096z680.png) showing pink dripping 'Rawly41' text on a turquoise swirl background

Create a web app manifest file (manifest.json) in the frontend/public directory with proper PWA configuration including app name 'Rawly41 Store', short_name, description, display mode 'standalone', theme color matching the turquoise brand color, and background color

Generate app icons in multiple sizes (192x192, 512x512, 180x180 for Apple) using the uploaded Rawly41 logo with pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background, and configure the manifest to reference these icons with proper sizes and types
Update frontend/index.html to include manifest link tag, Apple touch icon meta tag, theme-color meta tag, and apple-mobile-web-app-capable meta tag for proper PWA and iOS home screen support
